solution_line_template: First, we need to determine how many slices of bread Jimmy will use to make the sandwiches. We determine this by performing {num_sandwiches}*{slices_per_sandwich}=<<{num_sandwiches}*{slices_per_sandwich}={total_slices_needed}>>{total_slices_needed} slices of bread needed.

We then divide the number of slices needed by the number of slices per bread pack, performing {total_slices_needed}/{slices_per_pack}=<<{total_slices_needed}/{slices_per_pack}={packs_needed}>>{packs_needed} packs of bread needed.
